statements: SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_date, engagement_level FROM user_interactions WHERE engagement_level > 3;
SELECT material_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, engagement_level FROM user_interactions WHERE engagement_level = 5 ORDER BY material_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE material_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND interaction_type IN ('view', 'comment') ORDER BY engagement_level DESC, interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' AND engagement_level > 3 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, AVG(engagement_level) AS avg_engagement FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT DISTINCT interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE material_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY interaction_type DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 5;
SELECT material_id, SUM(engagement_level) AS total_engagement FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 123 GROUP BY material_id ORDER BY total_engagement DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions
SELECT material_name, publish_date FROM learning_materials
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM learning_materials ORDER BY material_type DESC
SELECT user_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 5
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM learning_materials WHERE publish_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY material_id;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type LIKE '%question%' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM learning_materials WHERE material_type = 'Video' OR material_type = 'Document' ORDER BY publish_date DESC, material_name;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 10 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users;
SELECT email, enrollment_date FROM users WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor, creation_date FROM courses ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, count(*) AS num_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id;

SELECT u.username, c.course_name, ui.interaction_date FROM users u JOIN user_interactions ui ON u.user_id = ui.user_id JOIN courses c ON ui.course_id = c.course_id WHERE ui.interaction_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE enrollment_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT course_name, instructor, creation_date FROM courses WHERE course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, course_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;

SELECT u.username, c.course_name, ui.interaction_date FROM users u JOIN user_interactions ui ON u.user_id = ui.user_id JOIN courses c ON ui.course_id = c.course_id WHERE ui.interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY ui.interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT material_name, topic FROM learning_materials WHERE difficulty_level > 3;
SELECT activity_type, COUNT(*) FROM user_activities GROUP BY activity_type;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score FROM engagement_metrics WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, timestamp FROM user_interactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT material_id, material_name, topic, difficulty_level FROM learning_materials WHERE difficulty_level > 3 ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM user_activities WHERE activity_type = 'quiz' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT metric_id, user_id, engagement_score, timestamp FROM engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_score >= 80 ORDER BY engagement_score DESC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type LIKE '%click%' ORDER BY user_id ASC, timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT course_name, instructor_id FROM courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE role = 'student' AND username LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM enrollments WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM users;
SELECT course_name, instructor_id, description FROM courses WHERE course_name LIKE 'Java%';
SELECT user_id, role FROM users WHERE role IN ('admin', 'student');
SELECT course_name, instructor_id, COUNT(enrollment_id) AS total_enrollments FROM courses LEFT JOIN enrollments ON courses.course_id = enrollments.course_id GROUP BY course_name, instructor_id;
SELECT DISTINCT material_type, material_url FROM materials WHERE material_type = 'video' ORDER BY material_id DESC;
